text: And Tony Pulis, the head coach, conceded they were far too open.
You see him rotating, changing, chopping and moving players around.

Eden Hazard has been a standout performer for Chelsea, and back in November 2013, he was instrumental in securing a draw against West Brom with a last-minute penalty. His ability to change the game in crucial moments is something West Brom will need to be wary of today.
